duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead and develop a team of dedicated employees within the Gas Engine Engineering department.
Implement guidelines, define policies, and allocate resources for engineering projects and activities.
Drive the development of technical standards and procedures for Gas Engine Engineering.
Ensure regional law compliance, proficient workforce, and product line engineering support.
Improve existing processes, share knowledge, and review orders and quotations for compliance.
Participate in research and development activities, provide technical support, and represent Siemens Energy in front of customers and conferences.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree (B.S) in Mechanical Engineering or equivalent (Master's preferred)
